attributes.action: MTV lying about number of votes recieved.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MTV has refused to put Rick Astley in as nominee for their 'Best Act Ever'prize at the MTV Music Awards despite him gaining a massive amount of votes from an online campaign. This is an outrage, similar to the phone in scandals from earlier on this year. They must give a explanation for their actions and provide compensation or legal action will be taken.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
